steelsword.name: Steel Sword
steelsword.desc: More powerful than its iron brother.

bravesword.name: Brave Sword
bravesword.desc: Allows the wielder to strike twice.

killingedge.name: Killing Edge
killingedge.desc: Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

levinsword.name: Levin Sword
levinsword.desc: Deals magical damage based on Mag.

missiletainn.name: Missiletainn
missiletainn.desc: Owain only. Skill +1. The apocryphal brand?

sol.name: Sol
sol.desc: May absorb HP equal to 1/2 damage dealt. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.desc: Chrom only. Its power remains sealed.

exaltedfalchion.name: Exalted Falchion
exaltedfalchion.desc: Chrom only. Use this to restore 20 HP.

parallelfalchion.name: Parallel Falchion
parallelfalchion.desc: Lucina only. Use this to restore 20 HP.

mercurius.name: Mercurius
mercurius.desc: One of the Three Regalia. Devastatingly powerful.

solkatti.name: Sol Katti
solkatti.desc: Myrmidon/Swordmaster only. Res +5. A plainsman's blade.

treebranch.name: Tree Branch
treebranch.desc: Weak and ill suited for battle.

superioredge.name: Superior Edge
superioredge.desc: Hit/Avo +50 when the enemy has a sword equipped.

leifsblade.name: Leif's Blade
leifsblade.desc: May yield a Bullion (S) if the wielder's target falls. Trigger % = (Lck stat)

eirikasblade.name: Eirika's Blade
eirikasblade.desc: Allows the wielder to strike twice. A heroic weapon.

steellance.name: Steel Lance
steellance.desc: More powerful than its iron brother.

bravelance.name: Brave Lance
bravelance.desc: Allows the wielder to strike twice.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.desc: A weak throwing spear used for indirect attacks.

shortspear.name: Short Spear
shortspear.desc: An average throwing spear used for indirect attacks.

spear.name: Spear
spear.desc: A powerful throwing spear used for indirect attacks.

killerlance.name: Killer Lance
killerlance.desc: Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

luna.name: Luna
luna.desc: May halve enemy Def/Res when attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

gradivus.name: Gradivus
gradivus.desc: One of the Three Regalia. Use it to fully restore HP.

log.name: Log
log.desc: Weak and ill suited for battle.

shockstick.name: Shockstick
shockstick.desc: Deals magical damage based on Mag.

superiorlance.name: Superior Lance
superiorlance.desc: Hit/Avo +50 when the enemy has a lance equipped.

steelaxe.name: Steel Axe
steelaxe.desc: More powerful than its iron brother.

braveaxe.name: Brave Axe
braveaxe.desc: Allows the wielder to strike twice.

handaxe.name: Hand Axe
handaxe.desc: A weak throwing axe used for indirect attacks.

shortaxe.name: Short Axe
shortaxe.desc: An average throwing axe used for indirect attacks.

tomahawk.name: Tomahawk
tomahawk.desc: A powerful throwing axe used for indirect attacks.

boltaxe.name: Bolt Axe
boltaxe.desc: Deals magical damage based on Mag.

killeraxe.name: Killer Axe
killeraxe.desc: Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

vengeance.name: Vengeance
vengeance.desc: May add half the wielder's accrued damage to attacks. Trigger % = (Skill stat × 2)

hauteclere.name: Hauteclere
hauteclere.desc: Use this to fully restore HP. A timeless weapon.

ladle.name: Ladle
ladle.desc: Weak and ill suited for battle.

volantaxe.name: Volant Axe
volantaxe.desc: Designed to be thrown skyward. Effective against fliers.

superioraxe.name: Superior Axe
superioraxe.desc: Hit/Avo +50 when the enemy has an axe equipped.

titaniasaxe.name: Titania's Axe
titaniasaxe.desc: Hit/Avo +10 when under attack. A radiant weapon.

steelbow.name: Steel Bow
steelbow.desc: More powerful than its iron brother.

bravebow.name: Brave Bow
bravebow.desc: Allows the wielder to strike twice.

killerbow.name: Killer Bow
killerbow.desc: Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

longbow.name: Longbow
longbow.desc: Archer/Sniper only. Allows for long-range attacks.

astra.name: Astra
astra.desc: May allow the wielder to strike five times at half damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat ÷ 2)

parthia.name: Parthia
parthia.desc: One of the Three Regalia. Use it to boost Res by 5.

nidhogg.name: Nidhogg
nidhogg.desc: Lck +10. Also known as the Serpent Bow.

slackbow.name: Slack Bow
slackbow.desc: Weak and ill suited for battle.

toweringbow.name: Towering Bow
toweringbow.desc: Archer/Sniper only. An absurdly tall bow.

underdogbow.name: Underdog Bow
underdogbow.desc: Gains power when the enemy's level is higher.

superiorbow.name: Superior Bow
superiorbow.desc: Hit/Avo +50 when the enemy has a bow equipped.

bookofnaga.name: Book of Naga
bookofnaga.desc: Def/Res +5. Timeless magic. Effective against dragons.

nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
nosferatu.desc: Dark magic. Absorbs HP equal to half the damage dealt.

ruin.name: Ruin
ruin.desc: Dark magic. Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

waste.name: Waste
waste.desc: Dark magic. Allows the wielder to strike twice.

mire.name: Mire
mire.desc: Dark magic. Allows for long-range attacks.

dyingblaze.name: Dying Blaze
dyingblaze.desc: Fire magic. Powerful, but quick to break.

superiorjolt.name: Superior Jolt
superiorjolt.desc: Hit/Avo +50 when the enemy has a tome equipped.

wilderwind.name: Wilderwind
wilderwind.desc: Wind magic. Increases the likelihood of critical hits.

celicasgale.name: Celica's Gale
celicasgale.desc: Ancient wind magic. Allows the wielder to strike twice.

aversasnight.name: Aversa's Night
aversasnight.desc: Dark magic. Absorbs HP equal to half the damage dealt.

heal.name: Heal
heal.desc: Restores an adjacent ally's HP. (HP restored = [8 + (Mag / 2)]

mend.name: Mend
mend.desc: Greatly restores an adjacent ally's HP. (HP restored = [15 + (Mag / 2)]

physic.name: Physic
physic.desc: Restores a distant ally's HP. (HP restored = [8 + (Mag / 2)]

recover.name: Recover
recover.desc: Fully restores an adjacent ally's HP. (HP restored = [99 + (Mag / 2)]

fortify.name: Fortify
fortify.desc: Restores the HP of all allies in range. (HP restored = [8 + (Mag / 2)]

goddessstaff.name: Goddess Staff
goddessstaff.desc: Fully restores the HP of all allies in range. (HP restored = [99 + (Mag / 2)]

rescue.name: Rescue
rescue.desc: Moves a distant ally to an adjacent space.

ward.name: Ward
ward.desc: Boosts an ally's Res by 5. Effect lessens each turn.

kneader.name: Kneader
kneader.desc: Slightly restores an adjacent ally's HP. (HP restored = [1 + (Mag / 2)]

balmwoodstaff.name: Balmwood Staff
balmwoodstaff.desc: Restores an adjacent ally's HP. Use it to heal the wielder by 20 HP. (HP restored = [15 + (Mag / 2)]

catharsis.name: Catharsis
catharsis.desc: Greatly restores a distant ally's HP. (HP restored = [15 + (Mag / 2)]

dragonstone.name: Dragonstone
dragonstone.desc: Grants Str +8, Mag +5, Skl +3, Spd +2, Def +10, Res +7 when equipped. Allows a manakete to fight in dragon form.

dragonstone+.name: Dragonstone+
dragonstone+.desc: Grants Str +11, Mag +6, Skl +5, Spd +4, Def +13, Res +9 when equipped. Allows a manakete to assume a powerful form.

beaststone.name: Beaststone
beaststone.desc: Grants Str +3, Skl +5, Spd +5, Lck +4, Def +1 when equipped. Allows a taguel to fight in beast form.

beaststone+.name: Beaststone+
beaststone+.desc: Grants Str +5, Skl +8, Spd +8, Lck +6, Def +4, Res +2 when equipped. Allows a taguel to assume a powerful form.

blightedtalons.name: Blighted Talons
blightedtalons.desc: A monster's powerful means of attack.

purewater.name: Pure Water
purewater.desc: Grants Res +5. Effect lessens each turn.

hptonic.name: HP Tonic
hptonic.desc: Grants Max HP +5 for one battle.

masterkey.name: Master Key
masterkey.desc: Can open either a door or a treasure chest.

nagastear.name: Naga's Tear
nagastear.desc: Permanently increases Max HP by 5 and all other stats by 2.

armsscroll.name: Arms Scroll
armsscroll.desc: Raises the weapon level of all equippable weapons and staves.

masterseal.name: Master Seal
masterseal.desc: Promotes a base class at LV 10 to an advanced class.

secondseal.name: Second Seal
secondseal.desc: Changes a base class at LV 10 (or any level advanced class) to a new class.

sweettincture.name: Sweet Tincture
sweettincture.desc: Restores the user's HP by 5. Not very effective.

krissconfect.name: Kris's Confect
krissconfect.desc: Grants Max HP +5 and Def/Res +2 for one battle.

tikistear.name: Tiki's Tear
tikistear.desc: Grants Max HP +5 and all other stats +2 for one battle.

seedoftrust.name: Seed of Trust
seedoftrust.desc: Builds support between two paired units (when possible).

reekingbox.name: Reeking Box
reekingbox.desc:
Calls Risen to the World Map. Strength varies by location.
Price changes to 4800 in Hard/Lunatic/Lunatic+ difficulty.

riftdoor.name: Rift Door
riftdoor.desc: Calls a merchant to the World Map. Wares vary by location.

supremeemblem.name: Supreme Emblem
supremeemblem.desc: The mark of a hero of the highest renown.
